frame.name: CeloNFT
frame.subtitle: CeloNFT â€“ A Community-Mintable Collection on Celo
frame.description: CeloNFT is an open ERC-721 collection deployed on the Celo blockchain. Anyone can mint new NFTs by providing a metadata URI, making it a fully permissionless and community-driven project. Each NFT is unique, stored on-chain with a transparent minting process, and transferable across the Celo ecosystem.
